faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp of sugar?
faqs.a: About 48 kcal for 1 tbsp granulated white sugar.
Yes, 1 tbsp is ~12.5 g carbs, all from sugars, with 0 g protein or fat.
1 tbsp brown sugar has ~52 kcal, slightly more due to molasses.

faqs.q: What about sugar in coffee or tea?
faqs.a: Adds ~48 kcal per tbsp; consider portion size for calorie control.
White, brown, or powdered vary slightly in calories and trace minerals, but all are mostly simple carbs.
